relproducts.title: Stockholm Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholmfabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey roller blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This roller blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Rock Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant, stockholm rock roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including the option of a rust free chain so you can get just the perfect finishing touches for your window. This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Tranquil Summer - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Delicate water-paint florals set a beautifully peaceful scene on the tranquil summer, with pretty wildflowers in rich purples, deep pinks, and pale lilacs. The cream, light-filtering backdrop has a near translucent feel, perfect for watching the light trickle through on a sunny day. The summer will add delicacy and charm to a country kitchen, where it can sit elegantly amongst light cream walls and units, accented by pinks and purples to bring out the gorgeous hues in this attractive blind.

relproducts.title: Urban Metallic Silver Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. On the lighter end of the grey spectrum, urban silver allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

relproducts.title: Malta Charcoal Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Malta is one of their most popular fabric collections. Malta charcoal is a dark, statement grey shade. An elegant hue that will work well with modern grey interiors. Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

relproducts.title: Joyford Tweed Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: An affordable textured weave fabric, their joyford range comes in a few neutral grey tones. Great for minimalist homes or to add an earthy finish to your room. Charcoal greys and slate blacks looks great with this tweed grey fabric, pair with lighter paintwork and accessories for a modern look. Product id: db-rom0975 fabric colour: tweed grey material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Allium Summer - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Beautifully natural, the allium in summer melds a creamy white background with delicate florals and foliage imagery in greens, teals, and pinky reds. The result is one of peace and serenity and will work well as part of almost any dcor scheme. Group the summer with alike green and blue tones in a dining room for a relaxed and natural look. Opt for pale eau de nil walls and light wooden floors, with rugs, placemats, and accessories in accenting hues of blue and pink.

relproducts.title: Foliage Summer - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The zesty tones of the foliage in summer are summery indeed, and give a refreshing and lively look and feel to this roman blind. The foliage patterning allows you to bring the outside in, so nature lovers are sure to find it appealing. Liven up a guest bedroom by setting the summer against an apple green wall, adding light wooden furniture, and accenting throughout the room with blues and yellows.

relproducts.title: Funchal Summer - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The funchal summer is a quality woven fabric, adorned with a truly eye-catching design. The wide range of greens used to define the plant-life contrast beautifully with the subtle off-white canvas-like background. The way in which the leaves appear to have been applied like watercolours on a canvas give the funchal a unique and fashionable look. A great way of injecting a sense of summer and the outdoors into your home, the summer will work perfectly in the master bedroom.

relproducts.title: Phoebe Summer - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The phoebe in summer is a quirky rainbow of colour, offering an abstract foliage print in pastel shades of lilac, aqua, pink, and green, accented by deeper hues of black, blue, and grey. The overall look is one of funky character and certainly one for colour lovers. Hang the summer in a studio or creative area, where the variety of colours will leave you inspired. Don't be afraid of adding more colour throughout the rest of the room either, opting for paler shades found in the blind, such as pale aqua.

relproducts.title: Kiribati Summer Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Bring a pop of colour to your home interior with this voyage maison design. Their kiribati summer roman blind is simply divine with the joyful colour palette of pinks, purples and blues and its striking watercolour style. The dot design adds a playful charm to this smart and t bring a pop of colour to your home interior with this voyage maison design.

relproducts.title: Ilinizas Summer Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Showcasing a joyful flower meadow, hand-painted in a myriad of blending watercolours, the ilinizas summer roman blind reminds us of a lovely summers day. It features a stunning collection of brightly coloured flowers, with pops of vibrant pink, teal and yellow. The floral be showcasing a joyful flower meadow, hand-painted in a myriad of blending watercolours, the ilinizas summer roman blind reminds us of a lovely summers day.
